Our Objectives

Expand Access

Ensure that all children have access to quality education.

Improve Quality

Improve the quality of education through better resources and teacher training.

Foster Innovation

Encourage innovative teaching methods and curriculum.

Milestones

2010

Founded the organization.

2012

Built the first school in Nigeria.

2016

Reached 50,000 students across Africa.

2020

Trained 3,000 teachers in innovative teaching methods.
